tool.name: MaiqMag Resolution Inference
tool.description: A tool to predict high resolution data
tool.command: mkdir input_data && #for $input in $input_data ln -s $input input_data/${input.element_identifier} && #end for export TORCHINDUCTOR_CACHE_DIR=/tmp/torchinductor && pixi run --as-is --manifest-path /app python -m maiqmag_ml infer --ckpt $model --data_root input_data --save res.png > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2) && mv res.png $result
tool.help:
**MaiqMag Resolution Inference**
This is a Galaxy tool to predict data using the resolution model.
